Diesel Runner blinked in confusion for a moment.
Was this transformer's optics malfunctioning?
She glanced back to the level ground where their ship HAD been...and where 
the ashes that had been left of it were now buried.
With nothing there now but fresh earth.

" It WAS just behind us. But we buried what was left and could only salvage 
useless things from it. Which we have on us now." she explained as she 
looked back to Maxima.
Although, surprise showed in her optics when she heard that there were 
Autobots and Maximals here as well.
Blue Flame had overheard as well, and stared almost in disbelief at the 
strange Decepticon that had rescued them. " There are MORE transformers 
here? How? Do you know where we are? Or a way off?"
